content: i love knitting baby hats there will always be new babies so there will always be a reason to make them this design looks really cute and if perfect for boy girl or don t know yet babies requirements ~ dk yarn 4mm needles sizes ~ medium preemie large preemie 0 - 3 months 6 months the stitch looks like a little cable but it is actually made using a twisted stitch - no cable needle required so sweet - i will be making many of these i am sure **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
